body: I love how it's very vanilla-ish at first and then switch 180° become very depressing at the end. plus the sex scenes are hot af

Good read and art, stupid wife. Rather than supporting his husband directly, she sold her body for him. What a slut, especially knowing she knows what will happen.
I just want to know how dose it fell your cheating with your life partner later what are you going  to do if you cross the line?
+sang007 well.....use that fear to love her even more, that's the only solution XD

If you think about it, her being pregnant would mean that her husband's boss would 'cut her loose' (dump her), leaving her with no choice but to remain with her oblivious husband, on whom she has cheated, carrying a child that's not his. I don't understand the fact of falling in love with someone who only wants to bang you, knowing that once you stop having any physical value you'll get dumped, but I guess that's how relationships work (she also states that she enjoyed sex for the first time with her lover and NOT with her husband, which is very sad, seeing that they were high school sweethearts).
Mennnnnn, the ending was like wow, i did like it tought.

She knew what would happen when she first met the boss, she was never stolen.
@rogron i think you don't know what netorare really is. "NTR is often accomplished by having the main protagonist's loved one seduced away from them, with or without their knowledge."

NETORARE IS WHEN THE SORRY FUCK WHO IS GETTING CHEATED ON FINDS OUT ABOUT IT AND THE GIRL IS STOLEN FROM HIM.
It's only cheating when he does not find out.
